lead_paragraph: FENNESSY--Eamon. Eamon Terence Fennessy, of Prides Crossing, MA, February 5, 2016, age 83. Beloved husband of 59 years to Mary- Louise; and their five children: Kevin (Nancy); Maureen Bousa (Edward); Terence (Lori); Meaghan Keeley (Tyler) and Conor (Maura). Eamon's legendary sense of humor will be carried on by his fifteen grandchildren: Marina Morrissey (Patrick); Eamon Bousa; Conor Keeley; Grace Fennessy; Rory Keeley; Joseph Fennessy; Bridget Bousa; Liam Fennessy; Emma Fennessy; Monica Bousa; Duncan Keeley; Kelly Fennessy; Rose Fennessy; Seamus Fennessy and Killeen Fennessy. Eamon is survived by two sisters Helen (Ray) Cavanaugh and Kathleen McGill; and brother-in- law William Burke. His funeral Mass will be celebrated at St. Margaret's Church, 672 Hale St., Beverly Farms, MA, Saturday, February 13, 2016 at 10:30am, followed by a burial at the Mount Benedict Cemetery, West Roxbury, MA at 3pm. Relatives and friends are invited to attend. Visiting hours at the Campbell Funeral Home, 525 Cabot Street, Beverly, Friday from 4pm-8pm. In lieu of flowers, please send memorial donations to Boston Latin School Association, 27 School Street, Suite 300, Boston, MA 02108. Information, directions, condolences at: campbellfuneral.com. 1/3
